title: [The bleeding Iphigenia or An excellent preface of a work unfinished, published by the authors frind, [sic] with the reasons of publishing it.]
author: French, Nicholas, 1604-1678.
notes: Leaf [cross]6 verso signed: N.N. = Nicholas French. Cf. DNB entry on French.
Title from leaf [cross]1; this work consists entirely of prefaces, without title page, in all copies known.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
